TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EventKeywords extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines the standard keywords that apply to events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can customize the meaning of a keyword by assigning different names to the flags.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the EventKeywords class to redefine event keywords. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
[!code-vb[ETWTrace#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.diagnostics.tra_5_1.vb)] [!code-cs[ETWTrace#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.diagnostics.tra_5_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords AuditFailure = int64(4503599627370496)

Docs.summary: Attached to all failed security audit events. Use this keyword only for events in the security log.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords AuditSuccess = int64(9007199254740992)

Docs.summary: Attached to all successful security audit events. Use this keyword only for events in the security log.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords CorrelationHint = int64(4503599627370496)

Docs.summary: Attached to transfer events where the related activity ID (correlation ID) is a computed value and is not guaranteed to be unique (that is, it is not a real GUID).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords EventLogClassic = int64(36028797018963968)

Docs.summary: Attached to events that are raised by using the function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords None = int64(0)

Docs.summary: No filtering on keywords is performed when the event is published.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords Sqm = int64(2251799813685248)

Docs.summary: Attached to all Service Quality Mechanism (SQM) events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords WdiContext = int64(562949953421312)

Docs.summary: Attached to all Windows Diagnostics Infrastructure (WDI) context events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords WdiDiagnostic = int64(1125899906842624)

Docs.summary: Attached to all Windows Diagnostics Infrastructure (WDI) diagnostic events.
